control_attributes.control_description: The organization requires the developer of the information system or system component to archive the system or component to be released or delivered together with the corresponding evidence supporting the final security review.
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization requires the developer of the information system, system component, or information system service to:

Control Statement: The organization requires the developer of the information system or system component to archive the system or component to be released or delivered together with the corresponding evidence supporting the final security review.
